title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.12 - Deprivation of personal hygiene
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.12 - Deprivation of personal hygiene

State Regulations

Any decision to deny, restrict or limit an inmate of any
right, service, item or article, guaranteed an inmate by the provisions of this

Part, shall be done in accordance with section
7075.5
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7005.12

Adopted

New

York State Register June 5, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 6/5/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
